Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that everything the speaker said on the campaign trail has been factually accurate.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is contradicted by evidence of inaccuracies in the speaker's statements.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, which is that the speaker made mistakes in defending his candidate and mischaracterized his comments.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the accuracy of the speaker's statements by stating that everything said was factually accurate.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times as it is proven false by evidence of inaccuracies in the speaker's statements.
